Text.Page: That {@LinkCreature:250#1001} I saw in {@Rgn:76001} went down into Viridian Caverns. What's going on?<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"I'll get it. You stay put."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

Yes. I'll be right here.

And be careful.

I remember you. Can you help me again? I need to fuse the iteris shards with the metal for the weapon. If I had a certain sap, an alchemist could make a fusion draught for me.<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"I'll get it for you."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>
Thank you! I need the sap from the rati tree. It's in a nearby cavern. I thought I could find it, but I might be a bit lost.

(This is the rati tree.)

(You should collect the sap.)

I'm forever in your debt. Thanks to you, I can finish constructing my weapon and complete my hushang ceremony.

I'd better get back to Kanstria. Thanks again!
